book.synopsis: The latest title in the acclaimed Roger the Chapman series When Roger the Chapman discovers he has a hitherto unknown half-brother, he has mixed feelings about the matter. But when John Wedmore is accused of being the young page who, six years earlier, robbed his mistress and murdered a fellow servant, and is thrown into prison, Roger feels obliged to investigate the charge.
book.title_long: The Prodigal Son (Roger the Chapman Mysteries)
book.dimensions: Height: 8.44 Inches, Length: 5.48 Inches, Weight: 0.75 Pounds, Width: 0.79 Inches
